default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Huh... Where are you taking me? Oh, food and lodging are included? Great! What's my room number?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Hmm? You want to watch a film I made?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I will make everyone see me and respect me.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Lights, camera, action!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: See? I'm still a professional.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Haha... I knew I'd ruin everything.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: A good show is about to start!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: In the end, I couldn't leave anything behind...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Oh, you're here? Good timing. I found a movie that we can watch together.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Don't fret over past mistakes. If you want to improve, keep moving forward.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: No one's life is perfect, but I can capture everyone's most perfect moments. Here, show me a smile.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Flexibility is a trait of a mature adult... Of course, flexing too much will cause painful sprains.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: The Legends of the Minos Hero... This might make a great film.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I want to record all those who refuse to accept fate, and immortalize their gazes and cries in film.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I maybe weak, I maybe mediocre, yet at the certain moments, I can also be the hero.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Reality is a far cry from the beautiful scenes depicted in movies. Countless shining souls disappear in the blink of an eye, like shooting stars... If only I could catch one of them... What I mean is, to me, you're a shining star, and the focal point of this world. Would you like to be the male lead of my film?

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Reality is a far cry from the beautiful scenes depicted in movies. Countless shining souls disappear in the blink of an eye, like shooting stars... If only I could catch one of them... What I mean is, to me, you're a shining star, and the focal point of this world. Would you like to be the female lead of my film?

default.title: Idle
default.text: If you observe with your heart, the material for films will appear before your eyes.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hey, you have to pay first before telling a filmmaker what to do.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: I'd rather you focus on my work than on me. Of course, I haven't made any good one yet, haha...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Yes, all right, okay, wait... for... me... to... come... back...

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: That was exhausting... There you go, that's everything I got, no more no less... I'm gonna rest now! Don't come find me again for at least... two days.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Aww, thank you so much...

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Uh... Ok, fine. I'll go, I'll go.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Are you... complimenting my work?

eclat_eminence.title: Obtain Attire
eclat_eminence.text: Look up, slow down, and hold that smile. Don't look at me, look at the camera... It's okay, everyone gets nervous at first. But you, my chosen star, you're destined to get used to this.

eclat_eminence.title: Greeting
eclat_eminence.text: Oh come on, we're already here. Stop being all fidgety. Or... are you waiting for me to help you out of the car?

eclat_eminence.title: Ordinary Contact 1
eclat_eminence.text: While I was gone, they really hogged the limelight, didn't they? Such a pity, I'm back now. Wait a bit longer, you might get a front-row seat to a spectacular show of these Eastside stars crying.

eclat_eminence.title: Ordinary Contact 2
eclat_eminence.text: Word of advice, don't eat the cake at the afterparty, it's made of fondant. Looks pretty, but tastes awful... How do I know? Well, obviously because I've tried it.

eclat_eminence.title: Ordinary Contact 3
eclat_eminence.text: I thought that I should've already gotten used to this by now, getting one more award won't prove anything... But being back here is... unexpectedly exhilarating. Probably because you're standing here with me.

eclat_eminence.title: Ordinary Contact 4
eclat_eminence.text: Oh no... The zipper on my back seems to be open... It fit perfectly five years ago... Ugh, help me zip it quick. Don't let them see!

eclat_eminence.title: Idle
eclat_eminence.text: If I'd known, I would've just arrived a lot later and let them wait. My face is all stiff from smiling...

eclat_eminence.title: Special Attention
eclat_eminence.text: Did you hear that? The spotlight will keep on shining, and the applause and cheers will never cease... Hmph, come on. Join me and we will become the center of the world's attention.

eclat_eminence.title: Pat Head
eclat_eminence.text: Hey, we are under the spotlight... Aren't you afraid our picture will end up on the front page of the entertainment section tomorrow? Haha, not that I mind.

eclat_eminence.title: Level Up
eclat_eminence.text: Emm, that's right, keep up the praise! I can take it.
